report.title: Get user trust for record
report.description: List all of the trusts associated with a particular record.
report.query: SELECT DISTINCT #columns# FROM user_trusts ut LEFT JOIN surveys s on ut.survey_id = s.id LEFT JOIN taxon_groups tg on ut.taxon_group_id = tg.id LEFT JOIN index_locations_samples ils on (ils.location_id=ut.location_id or ut.location_id is null) LEFT JOIN locations l on ut.location_id = l.id JOIN users u on ut.user_id = u.id JOIN people p on p.id=u.person_id and p.deleted=false JOIN users uc on uc.id=ut.created_by_id and uc.deleted=false JOIN people pc on pc.id=uc.person_id and pc.deleted=false WHERE ut.user_id = '#user_id#' AND (ut.survey_id = '#survey_id#' or (ut.survey_id is null and (ut.taxon_group_id is not null or ut.location_id is not null))) AND (ut.taxon_group_id = '#taxon_group_id#' or (ut.taxon_group_id is null and (ut.survey_id is not null or ut.location_id is not null))) AND ((ut.location_id is null and (ut.survey_id is not null or ut.taxon_group_id is not null)) or string_to_array('#location_ids#', '|') @> string_to_array(ut.location_id::varchar, '|')) AND ut.deleted=false

param.name: user_id
param.description: User id of the recorder associated with the trusts

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Survey id of the recorder associated with the trusts

param.name: location_ids
param.description: Localities the record overlaps with, separated by | if multiple.
